title: git module doesn't build in vanilla 16.04
body:
If you want to report a build error for some package, or a bug in core please use the following template as a guideline:

-----

Summary

### Expected Result

I expected to install git on Ubuntu 16.04 using spack

### Actual Result

Error message during build

### Steps to reproduce the issue
1. Install the vanilla Ubuntu 16.04
2. Execute in shell:

```
sudo apt install python-minimal build-essential
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/spack/spack
. spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh 
spack install git
```

### Information on your system

Vanilla Ubuntu 16.04 LXC container generated on Ubuntu 16.04 64bit host using

```
sudo apt install lxd
sudo lxd init #accept the defaults
#logout & login
lxc launch ubuntu:16.04 mygit
lxc list # Note the ip address of the container mygit
ssh <ip address of the container>
```
